Develop an AI-powered chatbot that can assist people with finding information and answering their questions. The chatbot can be integrated into various platforms like websites, social media, and messaging apps.

Create an AI-powered virtual assistant that can help people with their daily tasks like scheduling appointments, sending emails, and managing their calendars. The virtual assistant can be personalized to each user's preferences and habits.

Build an AI-powered recommendation engine that can suggest products or services to users based on their past behavior and preferences. The recommendation engine can be used in e-commerce, entertainment, and other industries.

Develop an AI-powered language translation tool that can translate text and speech in real-time. The tool can be integrated into various devices and platforms, making it easy for people to communicate with others who speak different languages.

Create an AI-powered personal finance app that can help people manage their money. The app can analyze a user's spending habits and provide personalized recommendations on how to save money and invest in the future.
